_sText:
<fieldset> <legend> **T'was the night before Christmas** And Santa is late. </legend>

Fortunately now he can count with **Santa Mobile 3000**! 


Designed to overcome the most difficult and demanding situations, whether they are traveling halfway around the world or defeat the damn snowmen who dare to cross his path!


Aided by a mega engine capable of levitating itself powered by magic and a fearsome gun that fires snowballs nothing can stop Santa from bringing a happy expression to all those children who are anticipating this special season!


And best of all! It doesn't require reindeers, which makes it very sustainable over time!</fieldset> 


This is my Prefab entry for [The Christmas Triple-Design Contest](http://www.gamebanana.com/news/20113 "The Christmas Triple-Design Contest")

And now seriously. I had some interesting ideas for this contest, many actually. Including a portable firing snowball machine and a "fantastic" drivable Santa Sleight. What I did was taking both ideas and craft them into this sleight of the future. I tried to make it viable. Not just flying brushwork, and so I added some fancy effects to it, including particles, and even a trail that follows the Sledge leaving a golden effect where is passes. But that's just some extras I wanted to include.


In case you missed it, its a drivable. And I've worked a lot on it to make it functional. Unfortunatly since the engine isn't made for this kind of stuff it leads to some problems, which I tried to overcome but some are just either impossible or not worth the time to fix because it can lead to more problems.

Anyhow, the Sleight works perfectly 100% in single player, and I've exaustly tested it with some people (thanks to them) and received lots of feedback.


**SOME FEATURES:**

- Drivable

- Particle systems

- Spritetrails

- Shootable

- Sound efects


**CONTROLS:**

- To drive this boy, you press E on the front part of it, it will instantly parent you to it and you won't be dropped off until you press "E" again or jump to get out.

- If you are drunk, you might wanna get on the back part of the Sledge and let your friends drive for you. Theres space for 2 passangers in the back.

- [W] Move forward

- [A] Turn left

- [S] Move backwards

- [D] Move right

- [Mouse 1] Shoots snowballs

- [Mouse 2] Lifts up


I know what sometimes causes the crash, thanks to Kaemon. Its when the round ends while someone is parented to the Sledge. Which unfornatly for me has no solution but I decided to upload it anyway hoping for someone to come up with a possible fix. This can still be some sort of a "base" to work with in case you don't know much about thrusters, which I had to "re-learn" to create this.

<fieldset> <legend> DOWNLOAD INFO </legend> 
In the download file you'll find 2 diferent versios of this prefab, one allows shooting, the other one doesn't. For both versions I included the VMF & BSP, in case you'd like to test it yourself or just chill shooting at walls.</fieldset>
I hope you enjoy this little something, I wish you a Merry Christmas and happy new year.
